appDescription.message: Do I Access allows you to change DOI numbers into clickable links to any site such as sci-hub for example.

correctBaseUrlMessage.description: Message for a good formatted base URL.

incorrectBaseUrlMessage.description: Message for a wrong formatted base URL.

scihubLocation.message: You don't know where is Sci-Hub ?

doiCountMessage.description: Message about the number of DOIs found on this page.

invalidGivenUrl.description: Message when the given URL is incorrectly formatted.

invalidCurrentUrl.message: The extension does not work on this URL.
invalidCurrentUrl.description: Message when the current URL is invalid for the extension.

switchButtonCount.message: Switch ON to see the DOI count.
switchButtonCount.description: Message in place of the DOI count if the extension is not switch ON.

optionHighlight.description: Checkbox message to enable doi highlight.

optionContactUs.message: Contact us through our website

optionDonation.message: You can support us by donating for this project and for following ones

sciteAi.message: Do you know Scite.ai ?
